channel.title: Comments on: SMO Script Index and FK’s on a database
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: David G.
item.dc:creator: David G.
item.content:encoded:
One issue I’ve found with SMO is that if your tables are contained in a schema, the foreign keys REFERENCES-clause will be missing the schema on the referenced table.

Otherwise, it works great.
